name: PortsDriver

aliases.name: Config
aliases.comment:
The `Config` record contains the output port, the input port a function handle
unknown input port messages. This record is needed for all the functions.
aliases.type: { output : Json.Encode.Value -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg , input : (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg , fail : String -> msg }

aliases.name: FileData
aliases.comment: An alias to make the type signatures more explicit
aliases.type: { id : PortsDriver.ID, filename : String, contents : String }

aliases.name: FileRef
aliases.comment: An alias to make the type signatures more explicit

aliases.name: ID
aliases.comment: An alias to make the type signatures more explicit

values.name: inputDecoder
values.comment:
Generic input decoder. Receives the tag of the message and a decoder for the
payload of the message. Returns a decoder that can be used with `subscriptions`.

values.name: localStorageGetItem
values.comment:
Requests the value for the provided `key`. The value will arrive through the
`receiveLocalStorageItem` subscription decoder.

values.name: localStorageSetItem
values.comment: Sets the `localStorage` key to this value.
values.type: PortsDriver.Config msg -> String -> String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: log
values.comment: Logs the provided `String` to the Console.

values.name: onFile
values.comment: A helper for input elements with `type_ "file"`

values.name: readAsDataURL
values.comment:
sends a read command for the node with the provided ID. The contents are
read as a dataURL.
values.type: PortsDriver.Config msg -> PortsDriver.ID -> PortsDriver.FileRef -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: readAsText
values.comment:
sends a read command for the node with the provided ID. The contents are
read as text.
values.type: PortsDriver.Config msg -> PortsDriver.ID -> PortsDriver.FileRef -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: receiveFileAsDataURL
values.comment:
Decoder for the file reader `readAsDataURL` command replay. The message creator
receives the `ID` of the input node, the `filename` and the contents of the file
as a `String`.

values.name: receiveFileAsText
values.comment:
Decoder for the file reader `readAsText` command replay. The message creator
receives the `ID` of the input node, the `filename` and the contents of the file
as a `String`.

values.name: receiveLocalStorageChange
values.comment: Decoder for the localStorage message received from listening for changes.

values.name: receiveLocalStorageItem
values.comment: Decoder for the localStorage message after `localStorageGetItem`

values.name: send
values.comment: Generic function for sending messages to JavaScript.
values.type: PortsDriver.Config msg -> String -> Json.Encode.Value -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: setTitle
values.comment: Sets the provided `String` as the title of the page.

values.name: subscriptions
values.comment:
The main subscription. Receives a list of decoders for the messages received
from the input port.
values.type: PortsDriver.Config msg -> List (Json.Decode.Decoder msg) -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg

values.name: updateCss
values.comment:
Updates the head node with a style node containing the value provided as a
`String`.
